channel.title: Obscurepkers where noobs become pkers
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://obscurepkers.net/img/header.png[/img]
[SIZE=5][U]Our current state is at BETA[/U][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][U]Why would you want to join?[/U][/SIZE]
We are not a Server that is Online for the Donations. We are here to give you the best RSPS experience, and fun, thats all we care about. We listen to our community, we don't sell staff and such, you have to earn your way up. We also listen to every single Bug report, Suggestion and everything else that affects the playerbase.
[SIZE=5][COLOR="#FF0000"]You need jre8 to launch the Loader[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/984fdf8bd20b70e0fa7797cd1f655c19.png[/img]
There are many features in-game, down here is a list of what we have, simply click the download client link and start playing.
[COLOR=red]Site[/COLOR] [url=http://obscurepkers.net/forum][COLOR=red]Click Here[/COLOR][/url] [COLOR=red]Loader[/COLOR] [url=http://obscurepkers.net/loader.jar][COLOR=red]Click Here[/COLOR][/url] [COLOR=red]Download Client[/COLOR] [url=http://luzoxpk.net/obscurepkers.jar][COLOR=red]Click Here[/COLOR][/url] [COLOR=red]Vote[/COLOR] [url=http://obscurepkers.net/vote][COLOR=red]Click Here[/COLOR][/url]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=red]Loading #64 OSRS items[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/5af04733b9f86dbc235dd4192482bc47.png[/img]
Were loading #65 Items and animated npcs soon.
[SIZE=4][COLOR=red]OSRS Bounty hunter replica[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/80bfef9935be8b69d4ca299101cec983.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/352c3e248f0a92cadfa71ca96ecdfdfe.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=red]Bank Tabs[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/de4820de1832f2e09d05321be0284187.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=red]Boss pets[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/8ed503086712233633931ee31f1aa0a8.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=red]All Bosses In The Wilderness[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/ee042ea22cb7df30b306cb8c3ff031ef.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/5c066fb4a6da11c2099dca1085b1ae5d.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=red]P'King[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/30ae16a98cb2a3b503b165a9e63e3493.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/e3ecfdccea71a5a41b28d877781a592f.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/df66df8321877cd1a2dffa50813b14a3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/7d5473a551f6810c53527b04e019946e.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/680826806c8bb8d75568bf127ceb17dd.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/df26cc121d1ca99cc019ce55eaecf280.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=red]Misc & Account security[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/5e199080eb83d6e8417ddf6e2e066868.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/96d5215a7e94765c27ca3bc0e7aa3f0e.png[/img]
Credits: To Zivik sold this once to me and i just didnt want to remove it its neat.
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/f1a4396ee6360f83d29ea0e14121a42a.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/320c34f9fddc3c7c3be3e6f39a04706b.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/6c43a5bfea6a3bd059e6a11ea1d03fc5.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=red]Skilling[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Decided to make the server overall based but the main part is still P'king
[SIZE=4][COLOR=red]Farming[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/75f65e3b19b7f6e6b0e9fe025dfcfdd4.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/4afc22138c655398d397fea3e8657629.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/a4825939d4a5c996cdedfe3d2e963eb6.png[/img]
There are many more features but you will have to see them ingame.
[/CENTER]

item.title: Obscurepkers where noobs become pkers

[center]

[SIZE=5][U]Our current state is at BETA[/U][/SIZE]
